answerCandidate: Google's total revenue for the year ending December 31, 2021 was $257,637 million. This represents a 41% increase from the previous year. The majority of Google's revenue comes from its advertising business, which includes Google Search, YouTube ads, and Google Network. In 2021, Google's advertising revenue was $209,497 million. Google's other revenue streams include Google Cloud, which generated $19,206 million in revenue in 2021, and Other Bets, which generated $753 million.
